ExcessiveObjectLength.description:
Description

Deprecated

Excessive object line lengths are usually indications that the object may be burdened with excessive
responsibilities that could be provided by other objects. In breaking these methods
apart the code becomes more manageable and ripe for reuse.

Deprecated:This rule is deprecated since PMD 7.19.0 and will be removed with PMD 8.0.0. UseNcssCountto find big objects.

Example(s):

Use this rule with the default properties by just referencing it:

Use this rule and customize it:
ExcessiveObjectLength.option:
Name	Default Value	Description
minimum	1000	Threshold at or above which a node is reported
